numuth swaminwahanse owun sangawuseka. 27raju ee pothada baruk yeremiyage mukhayen asa liyu wachanada dawu pasu, swaminwahansege wachanaya yeremiya wethata pamina mese kiya: 28oba nawatha wena pothak ragena yudahi rajawu yehoyakim dawuwawu palamu pothe thibunu prathama wachana siyallama liyanna. 29yudahi rajawu yehoyakim ganath mese kiyanna-swaminwahanse mese kiyanaseka: babiloniye raja awith me deshaya nasthikara, methanin manushyayanda mrugayanda pahakaradamanneya kiya oba me pothehi liyuwe maknisadayi kiyamin oba eeka dawadamuwehiya. 30ebawin swaminwahanse yudahi rajawu yehoyakim gana mese kiyanaseka: ohuta dawithge sinhasanayehi hindinta kenek nositinneya.
